content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 5.40pm just on dusk myself and two friends were on the back varandah which overlooks a catchment area/national park as we walked out 4 glowing red orange bright orbs flew up diagonally from the ground at speed like nothing we've seen before perfectly apart on the same angle and stopped behind a cloud then a fifth one flew up from the same area but before it got to the cloud it came to a complete stop then flew right sort of zig zagged up and down a little then flew back left at a rate of speed like nothing we have on earth then went into the cloud with the other 4 we all couldn't believe what we just witnessed that moment right then made us all believers in that instant...
content.summary: Observed 4 orb like objects shoot straight up diagnally in perfect form moving at speed like nothing on earth then they stopped behind a cloud then one more flew up stopped then flew horizontal to the right then back to the left then up and down

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work and i was looking up at the sky and 3 pyramid shape objects came arcoss the sky very fast. one was red and one was white and the other was blue. it was my first time seeing a ufo.
content.summary: 3 pyramid shape objects going very fast

content.detailedDescription:
my friend c and i camped in joshua tree to celebrate new years eve 2012.  everything about this trip was perfect: things fell seamlessly into place and we were so excited to welcome in the new year.  we spent the evening talking and eating snacks.  we were in such positive spirits!  we had nothing bad to say about anyone or anything; we were just glad to welcome the new year.  shortly after midnight, c and i created a drinking game with champagne, proposing toasts to everything.  "cheers to the multiverse, for always providing what we need, when we need it.  cheers to the sun for making all life possible.  cheers to creative expression in the new year. whatever's up there, cheers to you."  (we only consumed half a bottle of champagne and the temperature was below freezing; it is important to note that we were not in any heavily altered state!)  we sat down at our fire and decided to go for a nature walk before bed.  
       we finished our glasses of champagne and walked into the desert and onto what seemed a different plane.  the moon reflected blue on granite rock faces as we explored.  we found ourselves on a trail that led us to the mouth of a ravine.  we stood in front of the ravine, c climbed on a rock and i stood below.  i was overcome with the need to pray so i put my head down and found myself suddenly still in a deep, rare state of prayer and good intentions for everyone i know: "please help so and so get a job. my friend needs to regain health.  help my brother communicate better.  help me communicate better."  
	c said look up and i did.  up was a bright gold light speeding across the sky, about 200 ft from the ground.  i started weeping the moment i saw it.  all we could say was "there it is!"  we stepped away from the ravine and out into the open and the light stopped to hover above us, glittery, silently gold and pulsating.  "let's go back to camp," c said and he turned and started walking but i couldn't move i was so mesmerized and the light was communicating something to me that i've yet to understand.  "let's go back to camp" and as we started walking the light drifted gracefully but quickly back up, true north, to space, to wherever.  
	we stumbled, hyperventilating, jumping and running over rocks and the light drifted higher, higher and disappeared.  we stopped, looked at each other and hugged, shaking, asking "are you ok!?" back at camp i just had to lay on the desert floor.  "did we just get abducted?" we asked, "how long were we gone!" (only about an hour.)  i'm not sure that we were physically abducted, but something happened with our minds and this light. 
	we now refer to the light as the goddess and we've come to some conclusions: the light was not a machine. but a being.  a living, organic entity. it was an intimate encounter, terrifying, but not threatening.  the encounter did something to our minds/bodies/spirits.  initially, this experience confused and frustrated us both: how could we return to our normal lives knowing this exists?  fortunately, we've been able to integrate this experience positively, into our spiritual lives.  i believe i know that the entity communicated ideas of lovingkindness to us, for we had this experience when we were in a most positive, joyous state.
	later, c confessed that i alone might have been abducted: "there was a time when you weren't next to me.  there was a minute where i didn't see you.  i turned away to walk back to camp and you stayed there, alone."  the world didn't so much end in 2012.  it began.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Gold, flame-like, pulsating light traveled fast then stopped to hover over me

content.detailedDescription: I was parked on helwig road speaking with my partner on the cell phone. it was just after dusk. as we talked i saw a fairly bright light "blink" into existence, very bright with a golden color, it vanished as it did, a second appeared at what must have been a great distance (uneducated guess would make me guess at 10,000 yards away?) it stay for several seconds as the first, then vanished as a third blinked in lasted 2-3 seconds then vanished. i said something about it to my partner on the phone who says made a joke that i must be drinking (i dont drink). we settled back into our conversation about 5 minutes later the event repeated itself in the exact same location with the addition of a 4th "orb blinking in at the end 10 degrees higher then where the first had appeared. i noticed these objects as they were in my direct field of view as i was sitting in my truck on the phone. i had no idea what the objects were, it didnt remind me of any aerial event i have ever witnessed. my feeling during the even was curiosity and wonder at what i might be seeing. i lost sight of the objects as they in turn vanished from view.
content.summary: Watched a golden orb blink into view, it dimed, a second appeard in line at unknown dostance, dimed as a 3rd appeared it dimed, repeated 5 minutes later in same location with a 4t appearing above to the right then it blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: On a clear night in either late nov 2013 or early dec 2013 ( i have to ask my wife again). my wife witnessed 30 to 40 red - orange glowing orbs in foration going from caillocoon ny  towards the forest. my wife said " they just kept coming". the direction would send them directly to the balsom lake mountain forest...My wife said that she felt strange and like she should not be there looking at this massive formation of lights moving from north est to south east.To make matters stranger, we were out a few months later and mentioned this at a local bar...Before we could finish our first sentance a girl said "oh you not going to tell use about the red lights in the sky" many people have seen that including me" twice...Large formation fo red or orange glowing orbs..Losts of them..
content.summary: Orange- red globes- in formation- 30 to 40 of them

content.detailedDescription: In mid feb. of 2011, my friend and i left for a brief snowmobile ride on the trail by his house in camlachie on. after about 15 min we stopped at a nearby waterfall. it was dark outside, about 5:30pm. we were in a remote area, along an old train track, there were no houses etc.  my friend opened a beer and i lit up a cigarette.  suddenly a tremendous light surrounded us.  as i sat on my sled i could see my friend's face clearly. he still had his snowmobile helmet on and visor up but there were no shadows whatsoever...I could see the suspension under his snowmobile perfectly. i could see the laces on his boots as he stood on the other side of his sled...We could totally see every detail of everything around us, it was like we were in a circle of light, like we were in a spotlight but the light was coming from all directions. from underneath, the sides, from all around. no shadows, everything on the snowmobiles was illuminated. i knew right away there was something wrong because the light was so strange, like we were inside a light bulb. we said, where's the light coming from? what's going on? we stood up and looked around for a source, and even though the light was very very bright, we did not feel the need to squint or anything. it went on for what we thought was 30 seconds then it instantly disappeared like with the snap of a finger. we talked about this for a couple minutes...You could see the few clouds by the moon in the sky, it was a very clear night.  as we stood up, it came back again, making us both feel uneasy. we talked while we were in this light. the second time it lasted probably exactly the same amount of time. when it disappeared the second time, we said we are outta here! we went back on to the trail and stopped to see if it was coming back again. we drove like crazy back to his home. when we arrived...There were guys meeting us for riding for 6pm. they were saying where have you been? my friends girlfriend was furious because she informed us it after 8:00pm! where did the time go? i do not know. i just, i don't know. i tried to explain we just went out for a quick beer and there was a light. we told them everything. they were waiting for us for so long, everybody was pretty much drunk by this time. so, no one believed us but i did say jokingly, i think we were abducted. the first time seeing the light, we could have brushed it off. but when it returned the second time...We knew that there was nothing that could have been making that light. the light was so weird, so unnatural. like a spotlight shining from all directions, even from below. i remember looking at my gloves and there were no shadows. i will never forget it.
content.summary: Mid feb 2011, my friend and i left on snowmobiles out on the trail near his home in camlachie on.  we stopped at a waterfall 15 min from his place and suddenly were surrounded by a tremendous light. the light had no source...

content.detailedDescription: We were under tornado warning that day and so i went outside to look at the clouds. i thought they were beautiful so i sent my daughter inside to grab my  phone so i could snap some pics of the clouds. it was still daylight out. so i took my pics thought nothing it till i started to observe an object in my pic. and then thats when i discovered i caught more than some beautifuls clouds for me to paint when i got a chance.
content.summary: Was caught in my picture. did not see with naked eye. look at pic plz

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
It was may 24th at 12 midnight. i was out in my field trying to see if i could spot a meteor from the supposed shower that was going on that night. i saw about 2 to 3 airplanes go overhead the entire time i was out there and be for i saw the ufo. 
i looked to the west and saw what i thought to be another plane. only, this didn't blink rapidly like a plane or sattelite. it also moved much faster. it was at the same height though.
the object had a cluster of at least eight  lights. all of them were arranged in a pattern that looked like a spiky circle.  the object moved across the sky without the usual lagging sound of a jet. it's lights were phasing in and out from front to back.  almost like  was crawling across the sky our leaving a trail of sparks.  i thought (because of the spark like look) that i was seeing a meteor from the shower.  however,  it changed direction fluidly.  arching back north and over my house.  
the movement and pattern of the lights was unlike anything i had seen before and this gave me the thought that it was a ufo. 
i learned the next day that the shower didn't start in my exact area until 3 am.
content.summary: I saw a cluster of red lights and thought it was an airplane. the lights blinked out in front and back alternately and reappeared farther along in the sky. almost like phasing.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown

i looked to the west and saw what i thought to be another plane. only, this didn't blink rapidly like a plane or sattelite. it also moved much faster. it was at the same height though.
the object had a cluster of at least eight  lights. all of them were arranged in a pattern that looked like a spiky circle.  the object moved across the sky without the usual lagging sound of a jet. it's lights were phasing in and out from front to back.  almost like  was crawling across the sky our leaving a trail of sparks.  i thought (because of the spark like look) that i was seeing a meteor from the shower.  however,  it changed direction fluidly.  arching back north and over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to check on the clouds for we were under tornado warning. the clouds were beautiful. so i sent my daughter in to grab my cell phone so i could snaps some pic of the clouds. cause i thought they were beautiful and when i get a chance to paint i wanna do that and paint beautiful clouds . well anyways i didnt see the ufo with the naked eye. but with revieve of my photos i was astonished to see what i caught.A ufo maybe even two. i have that picture and would love to share it. so plz give me a number were i can send it.Thank you mirna cantu
content.summary: I dicovered it in my picture. i didnt see it with the naked eye. look at my pics plz

content.detailedDescription: It flew over the opening of the trees with white iridescent colors on the underside maybe 20 to 50 feet above us while we were laying in sleeping bags. no sound just immense pearl like fluctuating color light then it was gone.
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere over the treeline in the rocky mountains during an overnight science camp retreat

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place in silverado, california around 1:00am and the year was approximately 1978. i believe it was the early spring because i remember the nights being fairly cold still. 

i was in my early teens, and i was spending the night at my friends house in silverado canyon near wild cat canyon. her moms house was one of the houses higher up on the side of the hill on the south side of the canyon (north facing). the window from the room and bed which i was staying in, had a visible view of the opposite north side of the canyon (south facing)which was very steep and only covered with sage brush. 

i was woken up by a loud pulsating buzzing noise. i immediately noticed an extremely bright light on the horizon across the canyon and then it began heading towards the house. the light was in an spherical orb shape, glowing from within, but it also had a haze around it kind of like an aura. i noticed it did not seem to cast any light around it or shadows, which was very strange to me because it was so intensely bright like a massive search light. i got the distinct impression that it was searching for something or someone and then suddenly i became aware that it was looking right at me as if they became aware that i was looking at them. 

the light only hovered momentarily over that north rim of the canyon, but then it quickly dropped down sharply at a steep angle just feet over the sage brush and came undulating over the outline of each tree at a high rate of speed.  from the bottom of the canyon it came directly in front of the window i was looking through! it seemed as if the light then penetrated only that room i was in. it was rather unnerving and i tried shaking my friend awake. she opened her eyes for a second and went right back to sleep. the sphere remained in that position for a few moments and i almost felt panic like i was not safe. i then saw two more orbs appear over the same horizon, following the same path, same speed and brightness, but this time they joined the initial orb, hovered for a second and whooshed off at what i would describe as a speed and vibration and intensity that was almost unimaginable. they left over the roof top heading directly south from what i could tell.  

i have had several more encounters over the years in the same area where i grew up and a few in other locals. my feeling is that they may have planted some type of tracking device under my skin as once a month or so for many years i would get a strong vibration in my foot and groin area, this would be followed by intense frightening night time experiences (dreams). this is the first time i have talked about this with anyone outside my immediate family.
content.summary: Fast traveling glowing spheres, undulating non mechanically stopping and observing

content.detailedDescription: My favorite part of flying is looking out the window, so on this trip back from florida i decided to take lots of pictures and videos from my window in the plane. i took 88 pictures and 11 videos. two weeks later, after going through them a 2nd time, something caught my eye! i found it in 3 pictures. (i couldn't find anything in imag1872, but i can send it as well if needed.) upon closer examination i found 2 other more green-ish shapes, underneath the main silver looking object. if you flip back and forth between 1873 & 74 (kinda like animating it) you can see i took them within 2-4 seconds of each other, and how high up the object(s) is going. looks like it was going pretty fast. did not see this stuff when i was taking the pictures!
content.summary: Pictures taken from plane window, not seen at the time taken

content.detailedDescription:
Awoke to strange lights over pool in rural canyon area with minimal light pollution.  went out to get a better view of what was happening and saw three orbs of different colors hovering over water in pool. each orb had a bright glowing color.  the objects seemed to be hovering with no sound and no solid visible craft body. i went back in the house and brought out a family member to observe as well the occurrence. 

later that year my sister observed the same craft while outside sleeping in sleeping bags. i didn't know until recently that she had this experience as well. she said that the craft came out of the hill and moved across the night sky until it stopped overhead and hovered there until going into the hill behind her and disappearing.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 orbs about 10 feet in diameter floating above pool

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba en mi casa acababa de llegar de una fiesta mas bien era a��o nuevo sal�� al patio a mirar las estrellas estaba muy bonito el cielo despejado mire hacia arriba y vi un punto muy blanco pens�� que era una estrella pero empez�� a moverse y las estrellas no se mueven creo yo, avanzo en linea recta ami derecha pero creo que despu��s se hicieron dos no vi bien por que fui a apagar la luz de afuera (ya que estaba en el patio)cuando volv�� ya eran dos y  estaba pasando un avion abajo de ellos reconoci el avion por que tienen luces  y el objeto era completamente blanco muy brilloso estaba muy lejos pero podia verlo muy brilloso y mas con las luces apagadas y ademas en mi calle casi no vive gente, al verlo o verlos me impacto demasiado as�� estuve diez minutos vi��ndolos despues desaparecieron se fueron alejando poco a poco hasta que ya no pude verlos fue algo de otro mundo.

pero tiempo atras como unos tres o cuatro meses vi tres objetos voladores esta vez estaba en la parte trasera de mi casa eran tres !!! avanzaban de igual menera i gual un dia muy despejado se veian claramente tanto ellos como las estrellas, pense que eran unas estrellas que si se dan cuenta siempre hay tres estrellas en linea recta nose como se llamen pero siempre se ven juntas, pero no estas tres, se movian al meterme a mi casa para llamar ami madre y a mis hermanos ya havian desaparecido.
content.summary: Hola, era uno pero se despego y se hicieron dos avanzaban en linea recta pero con diferente direccion.

content.detailedDescription: We were taking photos of the city at night across the brooklyn bridge. we noticed the object only after reviewing the photo on the camera. when we first noticed it, we thought it may have been some reflection from some material. it was at night and we didn't notice it in the air when we were looking at the city, but when we reviewed the photos it seemed to be hovering and moving.
content.summary: Did not notice the ufo at the time, but only after reviewing the photos.

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 11 my father and i used to take saturday morning excursions out to the mojave desert to do some target practicing. it was always in the same location. off of interstate 15 at hodge rd. just north of victorville. we would always drive west a few miles off the highway to a remote area where we couldn't see the highway. back then victorville was smaller and there was nothing for miles. on this saturday we decided to drive off a bit further near a rocky hillside. what we found were 3 perfect circles imprinted in the ground in a triangle formation. the circles appeared to be about 30 feet in diameter with a about a 6" deep impression on a slight sloped plain. my father would not allow me to touch the them. from what we could see is that it was either a craft with 3 circle shapes beneath it or there were 3 separate crafts that landed perfectly in a triangle form. if i remember correctly the circles were about 25 feet apart. the impression was kind of angled and had a defined lip. had to of been a heavy craft or just landed hard into the ground. my dad remembers burnt foliage around there but i dont remember that. just alot of rocks and hard desert sand. sure wish we had a camera or a cel phone back then. it's still vivid to me.
content.summary: Site where 3 crafts landed in the desert.

While bike riding on tuesday may 27 at 4:45 to 5:00 pm i observed four disk shaped objects flying/maneuvering in formation. three bright silver other a metallic red maroon  approx 3m in size at 200m height.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday may 25th, while at my grandfather's home in southern md, i was taking pictures of chemtrails with my iphone4 and posting them on my twitter page. 

on monday morning i was looking at my posts and pictures on my kindle and realized that i had caught something else in one of them. 

i posted the picture on twitter at approximately 1:43pm on sunday afternoon. so the picture was probably taken around 1:42pm. 

the picture is of a glowing orb like object with a red projection coming from the top and bottom of the object located on the bottom left portion of the attached photo. i took numerous pictures that day both before and after this picture and i saw nothing in any other pictures to indicate a spot on my lens. 

if you come to any conclusions regarding this object i would love to hear back from you. - thank you!
content.summary: Caught on film as stationary object

content.detailedDescription: Don't want to post info
content.summary: Driving saw shadow looked up saw transparent craft. next thing i was on side of highway car shut off 15 min was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Was taking a cigarette break at my work place outside at 2am july 7, 2012.
noticed fog rolling over a tree line east of where i was standing, when all
of a sudden a fleet of twenty or more saucer shaped ships were traveling
south east at a high rate of speed. they had larger white ships following in
behind them. these smaller ships were flashing a hot pink type light and
the larger white ones were a constant white. they were traveling at incredible speed with no sound and shot east of there original location
and ascended into the air. i had a camera, digital with a delayed shutter
and got one good shot of them. yelled for my coworkers to come out and see.
unfortunately they were on the phone with customers. i was shaking because i never seen anything like this before. if you zoom into the picture at the top
of the trees covered in fog you can see them. plus you can see the trail left by them making maneuvers and shooting straight east. you will notice one flashing bright pink with a dome support between the lights and the one next to it grey because it was in between flash. behind a larger mother type ship.
content.summary: Fleet of 20 plus ufos traveling high rate of speed shot east

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday may 18th 2014 i was outside on my deck watching the fireworks in the night sky. it was approximately 9:25 in the evening and i live in an area where there is very little light pollution and have witnessed several anomalies since moving in here a year and a half ago, but nothing quite like this. having seen several ufo's down here i tend to sit and watch the night sky often hoping to see others appear. looking up into the sky that evening, i witnessed an orb shaped ufo moving towards my house in the sky. most people were done letting off fireworks by this time, thus there was the occasional boom. but not much to speak of. what i witnessed was an orb shaped ufo orange and yellow in color, but was more orange than yellow. 
i was watching as it was drawing nearer to my home when in the distance there appeared a bright red glowing orb following fairly close behind. if the first orb moved left the red orb followed and it the orb moved right the red followed again. it seemed as if they were playing some form of sky tag, but the red orb stayed quite close behind the orange yellow orb. i just stood there watching in the dark, in absolute awe. the red orb looked similar to a japanese lantern in shape and they were not moving fast when heading in a straight vertical line towards me. i attempted to shoot video footage of the event with a video camera that i keep on my glass encased  mud porch and due to the many siteings i have witnessed here, but my camera would not work even though it had a nearly fully charged battery pack in it. i was able to watch this from both inside the mud porch and outside on my deck for approximately 4 or 5 minutes. suddenly the orange orb paused and then raced to the left of me in the sky and was followed by the red orb, and within an what seemed amazingly fast split second, both had vanished from my sight. i was in absolute shock and i just stood there watching feeling somewhat stunned by this event, but also in awe having been so fortunate to have witnessed such a thing. i called a close friend in hopes that she too had been outside and had perhaps witnessed this as well but was unable to reach her at that time. i am still watching nightly hoping to see them again. if not, i am however certain there will be more vents to come as i have now witnessed at least four ufo visitations to date. this event however remains the most thrilling and amazing to date.
content.summary: 2 ufo's in the sky above my home. the first one being a yellow orange followed by one bright red one of the same descripton

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my office floor on the 21st floor in a tower on queens blvd and jackson avenue.  i saw an object passing by out the window high in the sky.  the windows are all glass.  the object looked like a balloon initially but the speed was constant and it was flying relatively straight.  it did not wobble or waver.  i called a co-worker and asked her if she saw what i saw and she said yes.  the object continued in a southerly direction and seemed to rise very slowly as it continued onward.  at one point the object seemed to reflect light so i thought it might be metal and it seemed solid. there was a commercial airliner a few miles east and flying north toward laguardia airport.  my office building is parallel to the laguardia landing flight path as planes fly south to north toward rikers island.  the sky was overcast, so the sun was not visible or shining.  the object continued to rise as viewed out of the window until it could not be seen.  i was elated when i saw the object because i saw and filmed a ufo last year.  i was thinking about reporting the one that i saw last year and mentioned this to my colleague earlier in the day.  when i saw the object today, it was quite a surprise.  i began thinking how many people who see ufos do not have evidence and i could see why. i mistakenly left my smartphone home this morning and the camera that i normally carry with me was in my work bag on my desk.  i did not think to retrieve it in my excitement.  after the incident i remembered that president obama was making a speech at west point today and i wondered if this could be related and i wondered about the timing.  i did not know what time he was slated to speak.  i began to feel like i was over-heating.  i asked my colleague if she was hot and she said no.  she usually runs a little warmer than i, so i began to feel that the object was affecting me in some way.  we discussed what we saw and both decided it was a ufo.  there were no propellers, no wings and the object flew relatively straight at a constant rate of speed rising gradually as it continued on.  from our vantage point we see helicopters, planes and birds every day.  this object was neither of those.
content.summary: Spherical object that looked metallic flew straight at a constant speed with no visible means of propulsion

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard smoking a cigar and i'm always looking up at the sky star glazing. i turned nw i saw this pulsating lights. first i thought it was just a star, but i have never seen a star pulsate in such a way blue, green, red, and white. i called out to my daughter to come take look and she saw the same thing pulsating lights, told to go inside and get the binoculars and take a closer look and the object just kept on pulsating for about 20 plus minutes. we went back inside and it was still pulsating.
content.summary: I was outside smoking a cigar and notice this pulsating light.

content.detailedDescription: About 10 people on front deck of beach house in surfside beach, sc observed large red lights randomly coming on and off toward the southeast. after several minutes, they were still appearing randomly and them seemed to form into a larger rotating circle moving toward the west. after about 30 seconds, the 3 rotating circular objects seemed to disappear and we then saw random red lights going on and off moving north along the beach. the objects appeared at about a 30 - 40 degree angle to the horizon and estimate they were 1 - 2 miles out and about 2000 - 4000 feet as they moved around. there was no sound. objects did not move in a consistent line that would allow them to be a plane. they appeared in different areas and moved n ways inconsistent with a helicopter. if this has been an aircraft, the lighting size would have had to have put them right on top of us, yet again - no sound.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Random reddish lights on and off followed by a formation of rotating lights

content.detailedDescription: 4:10am 2 months ago witnessed a shooting star followed it, then 3 bright neon purple comet like objects materialised flew in formation then whoosh, they left behind a fast receding trail of light the clouds flashed bright blue and then there was nothing, the following couple of weeks i had a multitudeof strage things happen in relation to it
content.summary: Looked like 3 bright neon purple comets, accelerated rapidly left blue flash in sky and hole in cloud

content.detailedDescription:
During early 2014 i was traveling back from alabama on i-20 heading east 
towards georgia. it was around 2am to 3am (est) myself and one 18 
wheeler were the only ones out on the roads. the 18 wheeler was about 1-2 
miles behind me and could only be seen when we were on a straight section of 
i-20. about a mile to 11/2 miles before i reached the 205 exit between 
heflin and ranburne alabama i topped the hill and far in the distance on my 
right side i saw the most extreme bright white lights lighting up the entire 
side of the road and pasture. i was very confused as to what i was looking 
at. at first i thought that there may have been an accident and the police 
and rescue response were trying to recover vehicles....But then i realized 
that i didn't see any emergency police or fire department colored lights and it 
was extremely quiet.  i began to slow my speed as i approached closer and then 
i noticed the lights that were shinning straight through the tree line onto 
the interstate had not not only risen to above the tree line but had also 
turned from pointing towards the road to pointing towards to ground. i 
immediately stopped my car in the middle of the interstate. i looked in rear 
view mirror to see where the 18 wheeler truck was in relationship to my car 
because i wanted to make sure that i was wasn't going to get hit and also i 
wanted to make sure that i wasn't the only person who seeing this. the 18 
wheeler had also come to stop about 1 mile behind me and had his cab door 
open and he also had not pulled off the interstate. when i looked back 
towards the area where the lights were at.... the lights were just about 
tree top level and pointing towards the ground. the next thing i knew it was 
completely dark. i then was very confused and began looking about the sky 
for any thing that could have done this. still very confused and extremely 
scarred, i noticed a huge... huge!!!! triangular shaped object that had a 
rounded edges where the point of a triangle  would be. there was no sound at 
all and no lights on this object were seen now. this object remained about 
tree top tall as it passed over my car heading extreme north west. this 
object was as large as a football field if not larger. and was about 50 to 
60 feet thick. i could clearly see the pattern on the bottom and the sides 
of this object. i sat at a full stop in the middle of the interstate feeling 
completely terrified and violated and again looked behind me to check and 
see if there was any other traffic that the was going to hit me. the truck 
was no where to be seen and he was only about 1 mile behind me and was 
stopped with his door open only moments before. he couldn't have made an 
exit off the interstate because the 205 exit in front of me was the only 
exit off the interstate for a few miles. this left me dazed and confused. i 
now realize that i have time missing from when i saw the object in the field 
about tree top tall with its lights on and when it was coming over my car 
without any lights on. when i finally pulled myself back together and began 
to drive slowly home i realized that the time was now 4:12 am. i have been 
very terrified ever since this occurrence and i can't stand it now when 
night comes. please help me understand this so that i can once again go to 
bed and lead a normal life. i almost immediately began to have extremely 
terrifying vivid dreams about aliens tracking me and i have an unsettling 
feeling that i am being watched. i want you to know that i am not crazy and 
i have no psychological medical diagnosis. i do not take any medications 
that would cause me to see anything or cause me to lose any time periods. i 
am 47 years old and i am an rn with almost 30 years experience working as a 
nurse in the er, icu, and dialysis. i have searched the internet almost 
daily to see if anyone has reported anything similar to my experience. 
please contact soon. i can't discuss this with anyone. i can't take the 
chance that i am thought of as "crazy".
content.summary: Please read below

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted from my back yard, virtually overhead, and slightly to the west of my location.
daylight (near noon)
cavu, haze and high cirrus to north and south
time in sight: about 2 minutes
other witnesses: unknown
size of objects: tiny, undifferentiated bright white dots at an unknown distance. the size of a bright star.

i hold a private pilot license.

chevron of white lights, about 7, traveling from north to south over reno. the chevron comprised six lights (1 center, 2 right wing, 3 left wing, the seventh trailing several lengths behind). the lights were uniformly white and of equal brightness.

this was not a single object. i could see blue sky between the dots. there seemed to be no connecting structure -- and from the way the individual lights moved, i don't think that there could have been one.

the trailing light closed. the chevron morphed into a diagonal line behind the leading light to the right. lights continued moving around and the formation kept changing. there was always a formation -- not a random set of lights -- but the formation continued to change.

as the lights were overhead, i thought i could perceive two red-black panels, one to either side of three or four of the white lights. no blinking. no visible empennage. no sound (air conditioner was nearby, but i did hear a passenger jet pass over at contrail altitude shortly thereafter). 

no contrails. either the objects were below or above contrail altitude, or they weren't generating contrails.

the objects maintained a steady speed from north to south, eventually vanishing in the southern haze as i took my eyes from them for a moment and could not reacquire.

altitude: unknown (no way to judge) they could have been small objects at a low altitude, or large objects higher. i did get the impression of high altitude, however. during the time i watched, they did not pass any clouds or contrails for me to see whether they were above or below. a commercial jet passed over, generating contrails, after they disappeared, and i did not have any difficulty discerning that it was a commercial jet (i could even see the tail -- the empennage).

i am located about three miles south of the reno-tahoe airport, which has a tower control zone of about 5 miles in diameter, and rising to (iirc) 12,000 msl. these objects would have been in the control zone, or in the positive-controlled airspace above it. somebody must have radar information about this.

google is said to have a large weather balloon orbiting nevada, testing wifi signals. this was not a single object and not a weather balloon. the local tv station ktvn has a permanent weather camera trained on the sky. i have a call in to the station to see whether footage of 5/25 @ 11:45 am exists.

this being memorial day weekend, my first thought was a military formation, but the lights jinked around too much and got in front of each other as they changed position. also, they would have been in positive-controlled airspace, and that kind of maneuver would have been discouraged. the next thought was geese (which fly in formation), but there was no change in the brightness of the objects, and no sense of "flapping." third thought was a formation of ultralights, but they're illegal over populated areas and -- again -- would have been in controlled airspace, another illegality. since there were seven and moved steadily from north to south, it's unlikely to have been the planet venus. they did not drop, so were not flares. they changed and formed new formations, so were not balloons.
content.summary: Chevron of 7 lights moving n>s; formation changed to diagonal line, much jinking

content.detailedDescription:
This past sunday night, a friend & i were sitting on docks facing north, on east shore of greenwood lake.  around 11 p.M.  clear sky, stars out.  i looked left (west) and saw a bank of lights appear over the mtn.  they weren't moving, & as i watched, more appeared in a straight line.  i asked "jenn" if she saw that...She said "yes, whats on top of the mtn?".  i said "nothing, nothing is up there".  then i noticed one lone light off to the left.  the bank of lights kept "growing", then one light, within the set of lights, began pulsating brighter, then dimmer, then brighter again.  
 
i'm always sky watching & a firm believer (for years) & honestly, i kinda knew what i was seeing.  it def. wasn't a plane.  much to big.  i never saw a v shaped outline, just these lights.  all white.  
 
anyway, i said to my girl friend, we hafta go back to my house ( a 5 min walk).  i wanted my binocs & phone to take a pic.  we walked back & watched it thru the trees.  watched it as i got onto my front lawn, was still in same spot.  i ran inside, she followed me in.  by the time i got outside with my phone, it was gone.
 
entire time from i saw it to it disappearing, was about 10 minutes.
 
i called west milford, nj pd & also gwl ny pd.  no one reported anything.
i also checked on any local fireworks.  there were none.
i stayed up late, outside, hoping to see it again.  nothing.
 
when we woke up in a.M., i showed my friend a book i have on ny ufo's.  she pointed out a drawing from early 80's & said "that's kinda what we saw".  i knew it also.  i've seen enough drawings & illustrations to know what it was.  
 
let me know your thoughts.  this actually happened.
content.summary: Set of lights hovered over mountains

content.detailedDescription: As i paused my tv to answer a question from my daughter. the morning tv talk show went distorted.  the lady in the show was a blonde woman before i paused the show. i don't have an explanation for what happened other than i snapped a picture of my tv screen. my daughter and i both witnessed this event. can anyone explain this.
content.summary: Human turned into an entity unknown
